info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 4:30PM EDT until September 08 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Berkshire County in western Massachusetts... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hancock, or near Pittsfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, North Adams, Adams, Williamstown, Cheshire, Florida, Hancock, Savoy, New Ashford, Berkshire, Lanesborough, Hairpin Turn, Greylock, Sweets Corner, Soldiers Memorial Field, North Hancock, Cheshire Harbor, Arnoldville, Town Crest Village and Lakeview Terrace. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
